columns.name: db_cluster_identifier
columns.description: The friendly name to identify the DB Cluster.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the DB Cluster.

columns.name: status
columns.description: Specifies the status of this DB Cluster.

columns.name: resource_id
columns.description: The AWS Region-unique, immutable identifier for the DB cluster.

columns.name: create_time
columns.description: Specifies the time when the DB cluster was created.

columns.name: activity_stream_kinesis_stream_name
columns.description: The name of the Amazon Kinesis data stream used for the database activity stream.

columns.name: activity_stream_kms_key_id
columns.description: The AWS KMS key identifier used for encrypting messages in the database activity stream.

columns.name: activity_stream_mode
columns.description: The mode of the database activity stream.

columns.name: activity_stream_status
columns.description: The status of the database activity stream.

columns.name: allocated_storage
columns.description: Specifies the allocated storage size in gibibytes (GiB).

columns.name: auto_minor_version_upgrade
columns.description: A value that indicates that minor version patches are applied automatically. This setting is only for non-Aurora Multi-AZ DB clusters.

columns.name: backtrack_consumed_change_records
columns.description: The number of change records stored for Backtrack.

columns.name: backtrack_window
columns.description: The target backtrack window, in seconds.

columns.name: backup_retention_period
columns.description: Specifies the number of days for which automatic DB snapshots are retained.

columns.name: capacity
columns.description: The current capacity of an Aurora Serverless DB cluster.

columns.name: character_set_name
columns.description: Specifies the name of the character set that this cluster is associated with.

columns.name: clone_group_id
columns.description: Identifies the clone group to which the DB cluster is associated.

columns.name: copy_tags_to_snapshot
columns.description: Specifies whether tags are copied from the DB cluster to snapshots of the DB cluster, or not.

columns.name: cross_account_clone
columns.description: Specifies whether the DB cluster is a clone of a DB cluster owned by a different AWS account, or not.

columns.name: database_name
columns.description: Contains the name of the initial database of this DB cluster that was provided at create time.

columns.name: db_cluster_parameter_group
columns.description: Specifies the name of the DB cluster parameter group for the DB cluster.

columns.name: db_subnet_group
columns.description: Specifies information on the subnet group associated with the DB cluster.

columns.name: deletion_protection
columns.description: Specifies whether the DB cluster has deletion protection enabled, or not.

columns.name: earliest_backtrack_time
columns.description: The earliest time to which a DB cluster can be backtracked.

columns.name: earliest_restorable_time
columns.description: The earliest time to which a database can be restored with point-in-time restore.

columns.name: endpoint
columns.description: Specifies the connection endpoint for the primary instance of the DB cluster.

columns.name: engine
columns.description: The name of the database engine to be used for this DB cluster.

columns.name: engine_mode
columns.description: The DB engine mode of the DB cluster.

columns.name: engine_version
columns.description: Indicates the database engine version.

columns.name: global_write_forwarding_requested
columns.description: Specifies whether you have requested to enable write forwarding for a secondary cluster in an Aurora global database, or not.

columns.name: global_write_forwarding_status
columns.description: Specifies whether a secondary cluster in an Aurora global database has write forwarding enabled, or not.

columns.name: hosted_zone_id
columns.description: Specifies the ID that Amazon Route 53 assigns when you create a hosted zone.

columns.name: http_endpoint_enabled
columns.description: Specifies whether the HTTP endpoint for an Aurora Serverless DB cluster is enabled, or not.

columns.name: iam_database_authentication_enabled
columns.description: Specifies whether the the mapping of AWS IAM accounts to database accounts is enabled, or not.

columns.name: kms_key_id
columns.description: The AWS KMS key identifier for the encrypted DB cluster.

columns.name: latest_restorable_time
columns.description: Specifies the latest time to which a database can be restored with point-in-time restore.

columns.name: master_user_name
columns.description: Contains the master username for the DB cluster.

columns.name: multi_az
columns.description: Specifies whether the DB cluster has instances in multiple Availability Zones, or not.

columns.name: percent_progress
columns.description: Specifies the progress of the operation as a percentage.

columns.name: port
columns.description: Specifies the port that the database engine is listening on.

columns.name: preferred_backup_window
columns.description: Specifies the daily time range during which automated backups are created.

columns.name: preferred_maintenance_window
columns.description: Specifies the weekly time range during which system maintenance can occur

columns.name: reader_endpoint
columns.description: The reader endpoint for the DB cluster.

columns.name: storage_encrypted
columns.description: Specifies whether the DB cluster is encrypted, or not.

columns.name: associated_roles
columns.description: A list of AWS IAM roles that are associated with the DB cluster.

columns.name: availability_zones
columns.description: A list of Availability Zones (AZs) where instances in the DB cluster can be created.

columns.name: custom_endpoints
columns.description: A list of all custom endpoints associated with the cluster.

columns.name: members
columns.description: A list of instances that make up the DB cluster.

columns.name: option_group_memberships
columns.description: A list of option group memberships for this DB cluster.

columns.name: domain_memberships
columns.description: A list of Active Directory Domain membership records associated with the DB cluster.

columns.name: enabled_cloudwatch_logs_exports
columns.description: A list of log types that this DB cluster is configured to export to CloudWatch Logs.

columns.name: pending_maintenance_actions
columns.description: A list that provides details about the pending maintenance actions for the resource.

columns.name: read_replica_identifiers
columns.description: A list of identifiers of the read replicas associated with this DB cluster.

columns.name: vpc_security_groups
columns.description: A list of VPC security groups that the DB cluster belongs to.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tags attached to the DB Cluster.
